sentence: What do you call male and female jewish baristas? hebrews and shebrews.
explanation: A barista is a person who prepares and serves coffee drinks in a coffee shop.
first_new_sentence: The barista at my favorite cafe always makes my coffee just right.
second_new_sentence: I was impressed by how the barista knew each customers order by heart.

sentence: This joke had the only qualifying word based on your criteria, where barista refers to a coffee maker (first meaning) and relates to (humorously) the Hebrews in the context of the joke while also being a recognizable, single word.
